_header: Here shall ye hear a true lesson
_description: John Audelay, An exhortation — one 6-line and four Latin lines (Multis diebus iam percutis etc.) and twenty-two 3-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
I pray ȝou serys pur charyteWhen ȝe han red þis
                    treuly…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Prays fore me þat beþ presentþe blynd
                    Audlay
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 94-7.
